clause_text: 9.3 The part of land premium to be made available to the land-owning authority as per rates to be decided by GoM shall be exclusively used for schemes to be prepared for the improvement of infrastructural developments in the benefit of DRP.
section: PAYMENTS TO BE MADE TO SRA AND INSTALMENTS:
